definition: anew/from the beginning/(in poetry and song) repetition of a melody or rhythm
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
opera (or role) involving much singing and action/(fig.) highlight/main feature/major activity

sentences.english: Using a gun is one of the students' specialities.
sentences.chinese: 用枪，是警官学校特殊的重头戏之一。

sentences.english: The launch of the iPad was the highlight - another groundbreaking consumer Internet device that re-defined a market!
sentences.chinese: iPad是苹果的重头戏，重新定义了一个市场。

sentences.english: And India plays a large role in this multi-country orchestration of development of new products.
sentences.chinese: 印度在这个新产品开发的多国交响乐中演奏重头乐器。

sentences.english: They must be able to reproduce a build from bare iron at will.
sentences.chinese: 他们必须能够随意地重头开始再造一个构建。

sentences.english: I can't make an entire life disappear to start a new one.
sentences.chinese: 我不能让生命就此消逝无踪，重头再来。

sentences.english: I cant make an entier life disappear to start a new one.
sentences.chinese: 我不能让生命就此消失无踪，重头再来。

sentences.english: I can't make an entier life disappear to start a new one.
sentences.chinese: 我不能让生命就此消逝无踪，重头再来。

sentences.english: Our main attraction tonight is lady mud wrestling.
sentences.chinese: 我们今晚的重头戏是女子泥浆摔跤。

sentences.english: Instead of having yourself as a solid wall to lean onto during this time, you’ll be feeling that you need to start all over again.
sentences.chinese: 这段时间你不再坚强，而是感到需要重头来过。

sentences.english: School performance, expenditures, and income were given the most weight.
sentences.chinese: 学校的品质表现，消费以及收入占了评分标准的重头。

sentences.english: They have decided to make a fresh start in a different town.
sentences.chinese: 他们已决定在另一个市镇重头干起。

sentences.english: EVERYONE knows that the CCTV Spring Festival Gala has long dominated Chinese New Year`s Eve.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，央视春晚是每年除夕夜的重头节目。

sentences.english: For some guys, the annual fishing trip is the highlight of their calendar.
sentences.chinese: 有些人把每年的钓鱼之旅视为是行事历上的重头戏。

sentences.english: Given the current situation, you back home.
sentences.chinese: 基于目前的情形，你要重头来过。

sentences.english: One to live to make mistakes and then one to come back and do it again.
sentences.chinese: 第一次可以犯错，然后再重头来过。

sentences.english: We want to finish as quickly as possible and start again.
sentences.chinese: 我们想尽可能快地结束这一切，然后再重头来过。

definition: opera (or role) involving much singing and action/(fig.) highlight/main feature/major activity
to start over/to do sth all over again
large-scale Chinese opera/Beijing opera/major dramatic production (movie, TV series etc)
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]
qualities that make sth worth seeing (or reading)
to stir-fry leftover rice/fig. to rehash the same story/to serve up the same old product
to learn sth over again/to review/to brush up/to revive (memories, friendship etc)
